questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Light and objects

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) An arrangement of glowing objects

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) A landscape
C) Glowing rings
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) Two concentric glowing rings
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A beach
C) A dark surface
D) A crowd of people

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Flowers
B) Glowing rings
C) A street
D) A painting

A) Blue and white
B) Red and yellow
C) Green, yellow, orange, and purple
D) Black and white

A) Triangular
B) Square
C) Circular
D) Hexagonal

A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the arrangement of the glowing rings?
A) Side by side
B) Overlapping
C) Concentric
D) In a line

A) Smooth and metallic
B) Rough and rocky

D) Sandy and bright

A) Blue
B) Red
C) Dark brown
D) White

A) Natural daylight
B) Fluorescent lighting
C) Glowing object illumination
D) Candlelight

A) They are the same size
B) One is larger than the other
C) One is smaller but thicker

What is the primary source of light in the photo?
A) Sunlight
B) Moonlight

D) Streetlights

A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical

A) The background
B) The glowing rings

B) Sharp contrast

D) Concrete

What is the lighting condition of the background?

C) Texture vs. smoothness

A) Warm
B) Cool
